definition: To pay attention to or take into consideration; often used when referring to following instructions, guidelines, or advice.

examples.english: Please pay attention to the instructions.

examples.german: Er hat meine Anweisungen nicht beachtet.
examples.english: He did not follow my instructions.

examples.german: Ich habe deinen Rat nicht beachtet.
examples.english: I did not heed your advice.
Take note of the safety precautions.
